short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show both original and translated text.  English to Russian until more translations are added.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shows original and translated text, word by word on any site with text.

Helps you learn a new language, not just translate it.

Supported Languages:

* English
* Russian
* Spanish
